title: Here’s how the new Apple Studio Display compares to the Pro Display XDR and LG UltraFine
content:
Almost six years since its Thunderbolt display was discontinued, Apple has officially re-entered the consumer external display market with the all-new Studio Display. With a starting price of $1,599, let’s take an in-depth look at the Apple Studio Display vs LG UltraFine and Pro Display XDR.

more…

The post Here’s how the new Apple Studio Display compares to the Pro Display XDR and LG UltraFine appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: This in-depth comparison covers how things stack up with the Apple Studio Display vs LG UltraFine and Pro Display XDR.
